alert.note: Alert for Albany; Saratoga; Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 12:36PM EST until December 19 at 6:20PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mohawk River at Cohoes. * WHEN...From late tonight to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, moderate flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM EST Monday the stage was 13.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 20.8 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Mohawk River Cohoes Flood Stage: 20.0 Observed Stage at Mon 12 pm: 13.4 Forecast: Mon 1 pm 14.5 Mon 7 pm 17.9 Tue 1 am 19.9 Tue 7 am 20.8 Tue 1 pm 19.9 Tue 7 pm 18.8 Wed 1 am 17.8 Wed 7 am 16.9 Wed 1 pm 16.1 Wed 7 pm 15.5 Thu 1 am 14.9 Thu 7 am 14.4 &&
